attributes.background:
If  tracking has to be implmented, then why  carn't  it be used to track the THOUSANDS of People that are  still driving on the roads  despite being banned by courts from , thoughs that have been caught  driving with no licence and the ones that have never had a licence . This way the roads will only be used by the genuine people.
Where I originally come from  it has seen a 100% infulux of immigrants,  every week there are reports of these people caught driving with no licence.
What does frighten me is that to buy a TV to watch BBC you must prove you have a licence, however any one can go and by a Motor Vehicle and not show that they have a licence to drive it.
Seems to me that the goverment is more concerned with you having a TV llicence than a driving licence
